Articles.Content:
NEW: Latest Dev Build. Let me know what you think.

Just got to a major milestone with the GUI. This release is primarily meant to test the gui. The scaled space clouds don't exist in this release yet.

GUI is now assigned to ALT+E for now

https://github.com/rbray89/EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements/releases/tag/OVERHAUL-1

http://i.imgur.com/MV3QOJ6.png

That looks great rbray, thank you for including these features, it'll add a lot of possibilities!

Any changes to the cloud mechanism planned just out of interest?

So, I was looking at this and my eyes liked what they saw! Can't wait for Kerbin to look something more like Earth without the cheesy bright vanilla colouring!

I've got EVE, it installed without issue and has all functionality but for some reason BA doesn't work when I try to install it - even when following the read-me to the letter.

I was wondering what caused this - I have no other mods running but I am using 0.23.5.

I have a crash dump file I could post if that would help.

are you saying the improvements made by BA won't show up? Remember to put all the textures from BA into the main EVE file where all its textures are. Click 'replace' when necessary.
I was wondering, since in the readme it says to not have RSS installed, at what time would it get reinstalled? Just wondering, since I don't want to ruin my RSS adventure.

I was wondering, since in the readme it says to not have RSS installed, at what time would it get reinstalled? Just wondering, since I don't want to ruin my RSS adventure.

If not before the 13th(my last exam) by some other hands then definitely shortly after by me Especially as rbray's gone and done the new release of EVE, which looks ruddy epic!

Well, this is simply amazing. Congratulations!

Anyway, I've got a question: do any of you people come out with a sensible scientific explanation for the clouds on Minmus?

Also, if someone can say where this capsule is from, it would be the must appreciated.

Maybe the clouds are methane, erm... Kethane gas and the oceans are frozen kethane (would be very interesting to mine)

Here's what I've been working on for BA with the latest test build of EVE I don't wanna get everyone's hopes up since there's a couple issues still but I'm happy with the progress!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Wow great.

As for current, V4 version, how to disable the moon dust "atmosphere"? I love the sharp moon from stock game. Also, those dust rings are present at other moons like tylo and vall, but to the less extent.

Here's what I've been working on for BA with the latest test build of EVE I don't wanna get everyone's hopes up since there's a couple issues still but I'm happy with the progress!

http://imgur.com/a/o7bkT

Looks beautiful, looks like you managed to get the 2d clouds coloured? ..But volumetrics are still just in the white spectrum?

Wow great.

As for current, V4 version, how to disable the moon dust "atmosphere"? I love the sharp moon from stock game. Also, those dust rings are present at other moons like tylo and vall, but to the less extent.

Hit alt+N in map or the tracking station while focusing on the Mun. Then remove all the layers from the Mun.

Here's what I've been working on for BA with the latest test build of EVE I don't wanna get everyone's hopes up since there's a couple issues still but I'm happy with the progress!

http://imgur.com/a/o7bkT

It's beautiful

I'll keep messing with some textures and atmosphere colors.

I've been looking at some pics and I'm quite satisfied with this color.

I've also noticed I lost some of Laythe's layers. Might be time for a make over. Just something about Laythe turns me down.

It's beautiful

I'll keep messing with some textures and atmosphere colors.

I've been looking at some pics and I'm quite satisfied with this color.

https://i.imgur.com/GGkmhXT.png

I've also noticed I lost some of Laythe's layers. Might be time for a make over. Just something about Laythe turns me down.

Thanks! That shot looks beautiful!! Perfect colors.

Yeah Laythe just seems a bit dark and gloomy for a sandy beach planet with oxygen. Not somewhere I'd want to vacation at the moment

I thought it would be cool if volcanic plumes could be seen coming out of laythe. Since we don't actually have working volcanoes yet, we can just have the plumes coming out of mountains or areas on Laythe that look like volcanoes, or from the sea. It would peak out somewhere in high atmosphere, and fall down in a ballistic trajectory

Here's Laythe. How's a beachy vaction look for laythe, but still have a titan-esque look from orbit?

I like it!

I definitely approve!

Well, we're going to wait for EVEV8

Mun!

Jool!1!1

Moon looks definetely better but I am not sure about Jool
I think Jool's a bit too bright. That thing is like a mini green sun!

Mun looks awesome, but I don't like Jool. Just keep the old one, it looks fine!

'Don't try to fix things that aren't broken'

V5 UPDATE PROGRESS 2: ELECTRIC BOOGALOO

Javascript is disabled. View full album

V5 UPDATE PROGRESS 2: ELECTRIC BOOGALOO

http://imgur.com/a/1f0Gr

Looks real nice man, what aspect of the EVE are you using for that soft glow? I'd like to know how to incorperate it for the RSS config?

V5 UPDATE PROGRESS 2: ELECTRIC BOOGALOO

http://imgur.com/a/1f0Gr

Personally I may cry if you change Laythe from v4, the Mun looks MUCH better in v5 though.

Looks real nice man, what aspect of the EVE are you using for that soft glow? I'd like to know how to incorperate it for the RSS config?

Rim power and rim scale

Personally I may cry if you change Laythe from v4, the Mun looks MUCH better in v5 though.

I'll include a alternate config for Laythe, a much more lethal laythe.

Anyway, since there are a few thing's I'd like to share, but don't want to spam my forum page. Here's a tumblr dedicated to the development of BA. I already have a few things there. Here it is: BA DEV TUMBLR

Yargnit! so THIS is where you hang out...

Anyways, why is it called RSS when it isn't actually replacing the planets? I've gotten a bit confused...
